objectives.objective: Provide an intuitive, user-friendly platform where students can search, save, and apply for scholarships.
Integrate LLM assistance (GPT-4-mini) for drafting and refining scholarship essays.
Track user progress, deadlines, and application statuses to maintain momentum and encourage repeated engagement.
Build a community-oriented space for shared scholarship tips and peer support.

layer.name: Frontend
layer.description: Rails views or React-based UI for searching scholarships, managing applications, and drafting essays.

layer.name: Backend
layer.description: Rails 7.2.2 + Ruby 3.1.2 application providing RESTful endpoints, database models (Scholarships, Users, Essays), and user authentication.

layer.name: AIIntegration
layer.description: GPT-4-mini endpoint for generating essay feedback and suggestions. The Rails service layer communicates with GPT-4-mini.

layer.name: Database
layer.description: PostgreSQL storing scholarship info, user data, essay drafts, and GPT feedback logs.

dataFlow.step: User enters essay text on Frontend → Rails Backend
User data saved in PostgreSQL → available for future retrieval

deployment.notes: Ensure environment variables for GPT-4-mini integration, secure connections (HTTPS), and scale using horizontal or vertical approaches as user base grows.

stage.name: LandingPage
stage.description: User sees main welcome screen with calls to action: Sign Up or Login.

stage.name: SignUpLogin
stage.description: User creates an account with email and password or logs into an existing one.

stage.name: Dashboard
stage.description: User sees an overview of progress, recommended scholarships, upcoming deadlines, and can navigate to search or saved scholarships.

stage.name: ScholarshipSearch
stage.description: User inputs search criteria, sees a list of relevant scholarships, can save or view more details.

stage.name: ScholarshipDetail
stage.description: User learns about a specific scholarship's requirements and can add it to their list or begin the application essay.

stage.name: EssayDrafting
stage.description: User writes or pastes an essay draft, requests GPT-4-mini feedback, and iterates on the content until satisfied.

stage.name: SubmissionTracking
stage.description: User finalizes application, tracks deadlines, checks status, and sees overall progress toward scholarship funding goals.
